Package marvel.model

Interface ModelFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelImpl
    public interface ModelFacade
    Provides methods for clients to make mutable and accessor calls to APIs. Acts as an interface for the client to interact with the complex model subsystem.
    See Also:
    InputModel, OutputModel, ModelImpl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addObserver​(ModelObserver obs)
      Adds observer to list of ModelObserver, to be notified upon API requests completed

        name - - name of character to get information with

        Generates and sends report based on provided CharacterInfo's data
        Parameters:
        info - - CharacterInfo object that contains data to generate report with

      • getCurrentCharacter

        CharacterInfo getCurrentCharacter()
        Getter for input model's current CharacterInfo that it retrieved from last successful search
        Returns:
        CharacterInfo - CharacterInfo object that input model kept reference to

      • getImagePathByInfo

        java.lang.String getImagePathByInfo​(CharacterInfo info)
        Retrieve full URL path to thumbnail image given a CharacterInfo object
        Parameters:
        info - - CharacterInfo object that contains data
        Returns:
        String - Full URL path to retrieve thumbnail image

      • getReportUrl

        java.lang.String getReportUrl()
        Retrieve pastebin URL for paste generated for last report sent
        Returns:
        String - URL to paste generated for last report sent

      • isInfoInCache

        boolean isInfoInCache​(java.lang.String name)
        Check if there is character information in cache with key matching given name.
        Parameters:
        name - String to search database for matching record
        Returns:
        boolean - true if there is corresponding data found in database, otherwise false

      • loadInfoFromCache

        void loadInfoFromCache​(java.lang.String name)
        Ask input model to search for record with name as key from cache,

        If found and CharacterInfo created from record, set current character reference to it

        After input model completed request, notify observers request complete

        Parameters:
        name - String to search database for matching record

      • addObserver

        void addObserver​(ModelObserver obs)
        Adds observer to list of ModelObserver, to be notified upon API requests completed
        Parameters:
        obs - - ModelObserver object

      • notifyObserversGetInfoComplete

        void notifyObserversGetInfoComplete()
        Notify all observers to update character info

      • notifyObserversSendReportComplete

        void notifyObserversSendReportComplete()
        Notify all observers to update report URL
